Background.text: Single wire system inserted into the S3 sacral foramen to stimulate sacral nerve and treat urinary or bowel incontinence and/or retention

Complications.text:
Infection (early or late complication)
Pain
Device rejection due to allergic or immune response
Lead migration or erosion
Stimulator misfiring, transient electric shock
Seroma,
hemorrhage
, hematoma
Nerve injury,
paralysis
Adverse change in voiding or bowel function
